post1.title: Regulation
post1.summary: The Data Protection Authority (DPA) in Somalia regulates and oversees data protection, ensuring that organizations adhere to responsible personal data handling.

post2.title: Awareness Campaign
post2.summary: The DPA enhances awareness through campaigns, training, and outreach, informing individuals and organizations about data protection principles.

post3.title: Enforcement and Compliance
post3.summary: The DPA enforces regulations, holding organizations accountable, ensuring transparency, and promoting trust in sensitive data handling.
